alert.note: Alert for Banner; Kimball (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 07 at 6:04PM CDT until August 07 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM MDT FOR NORTHWESTERN KIMBALL AND SOUTHWESTERN BANNER COUNTIES... At 504 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Harrisburg, or 17 miles north of Kimball, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Harrisburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
